Content:: Biyagama (Sinhala: බියගම, Tamil: பியாகாமா) is a suburb in Gampaha District, situated in the Western Province of Sri Lanka. It is 14 miles from Colombo.[1] A Free Trade Zone was established in Biyagama in 1985.[1] "Kaduwela" interchange of expressway is located on Biyagama to Peliyagoda road.  This Western Province, Sri Lanka location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
